query.statement:
SELECT X.DOCNO, X.APSTAT, X.CRIRUM, -- 2019.07.04 전략마케팅 이상혁 요청. B.CS144_ARA, MAX(I.CTEXT2) ARA_NM, MAX(M.CTEXT2) TEM_NM, MAX(M.CODE2) TEM, B.CS144_BSU, MAX(F.ABR_NM) BSU_NM, A.CS143_SEQ, B.CS144_UPN, B.CS144_CST, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN '' ELSE MAX(B.CS144_PJT) END CS144_PJT, VALUE(MAX(L.CS101_ISD),'') ISD, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN MAX(VALUE(H.KUNNR_NM,'')) WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN MAX(VALUE(G.CS121_NAM,'')) ELSE B.CS144_GND END NAM_NM, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN MAX(VALUE(H.ZSITE_NM,'')) WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN MAX(VALUE(G.CS121_SPT,'')) ELSE B.CS144_GND END SPT_NM, A.CS143_SEL, MAX(C.CTEXT2) SEL_NM, A.CS143_GBN, MAX(VALUE(D.CTEXT2,'')) GBN_NM, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN MAX(VALUE(N.BMT,'')) ELSE '' END BMT, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN MAX(VALUE(K.CS126_UMR,'')) ELSE '' END UMR, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN MAX(VALUE(K.CS126_RMR,'')) ELSE '' END RMR, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN MAX(VALUE(K.CS126_CHA,'')) ELSE '' END CS126_CHA, COUNT(*) CNT, SUM(VALUE(INT(J.ZSPEC9),0)) PLT, A.CS143_JHD, A.CS143_FSD, A.CS143_PST, MAX(E.CTEXT2) PST_NM, B.CS144_GND, CASE WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN MAX(VALUE(H.ADDR1,'')) ||' '|| MAX(VALUE(H.ADDR2,'')) -- WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('','A','B') THEN MAX(VALUE(G1.CS121_P1C,'')) || ' ' || MAX(VALUE(G1.CS121_P2C,'')) WHEN B.CS144_GND IN ('C','D') THEN MAX(VALUE(G.CS121_P1C,'')) ||' '|| MAX(VALUE(G.CS121_P2C,'')) ELSE '' END ADDR, SUM(VALUE(K.CS126_AMT,0)) AMT, '' RMK, MAX(A.CS143_SCP) SCD_NM, MAX(A.CS143_AMT) UNT, MAX(A.CS143_HJT) HJT, CASE MAX(A.CS143_TSA) WHEN '0' THEN (SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = MAX(A.CS143_HJT)) ELSE MAX(A.CS143_HPT) END HPT_NM, MAX(A.CS143_HNT) HNT, MAX(A.CS143_HDD) HDD, SUM(CASE WHEN K.CS126_KND > '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FCNT, SUM(CASE WHEN K.CS126_HYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) HCNT, SUM(CASE WHEN K.CS126_DYN = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DCNT, SUM(CASE WHEN K.CS126_SLA = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SCNT
, A.CS143_FLG AS FLG --추가(2020.02.17)
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST143 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.CODE2 = A.CS143_GBN AND D.CODE1 = 'CS157' AND D.LANG = 'ko' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 X ON A.MANDT = X.MANDT AND X.DOCKIND ='7' AND A.CS143_DOC = X.DOCNO, SAPHEE.ZCST144 B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 G ON G.MANDT = B.MANDT AND G.CS121_UPN = B.CS144_UPN AND G.CS121_CST = B.CS144_CST LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 H ON H.MANDT = B.MANDT AND H.POSID = B.CS144_PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 J ON J.MANDT = B.MANDT AND J.POSID = B.CS144_PJT AND J.POSID_1 = B.CS144_PJT || B.CS144_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 G1 ON G1.MANDT = H.MANDT AND H.POSID = G1.CS121_UPN AND G1.CS121_CST ='' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST126 AS K ON K.MANDT = B.MANDT AND K.CS126_UPN = B.CS144_UPN AND K.CS126_CST = B.CS144_CST AND K.CS126_PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND K.CS126_HNO = B.CS144_HNO AND K.CS126_GNO = B.CS144_GNO AND K.CS126_DDT = '' AND K.CS126_PST = 'A6'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 L ON L.MANDT = B.MANDT AND L.CS101_PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND L.CS101_HNO = B.CS144_HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS116_PJT PJT, CS116_HNO HNO, MAX(CS116_BMT) BMT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST116 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS116_PST = 'A6' GROUP BY CS116_PJT, CS116_HNO ) N ON N.PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND N.HNO = B.CS144_HNO, SAPHEE.ZLCODE C, SAPHEE.ZLCODE E, SAPHEE.ZLCODE I, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 F LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE M ON F.MANDT = M.MANDT AND F.VKGRP = M.CODE2 AND M.CODE1 = 'VKGRP' AND M.LANG = 'ko' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS143_SEQ = B.CS144_SEQ AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS143_SEL = C.CODE2 AND C.CODE1 = 'CS156' AND C.LANG = 'ko' AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS143_PST = E.CODE2 AND E.CODE1 = 'CS117' AND E.LANG = 'ko' AND B.MANDT = I.MANDT AND B.CS144_ARA = I.CODE2 AND I.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND I.LANG = 'ko' AND B.MANDT = F.MANDT AND B.CS144_BSU = F.LGORT AND F.LGORT > ''
AND A.CS143_JHD BETWEEN #SDT# AND #EDT#
AND A.CS143_FSD BETWEEN #SDT# AND #EDT#
AND A.CS143_PST = #PST#
AND B.CS144_UPN = #UPN#
AND B.CS144_CST = #CST#
AND B.CS144_PJT = #PJT#
AND B.CS144_ARA = #ARA#
AND B.CS144_BSU = #BSU#
AND B.CS144_BPM = #BPM#
AND F.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND A.CS143_SEL = #SEL#
AND A.CS143_GBN = #FAIL#
AND SUBSTR(B.CS144_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','F')
AND SUBSTR(B.CS144_HNO,1,1) IN ('G','J')
GROUP BY A.CS143_SEQ, B.CS144_ARA, B.CS144_BSU, B.CS144_UPN, B.CS144_CST, A.CS143_SEL, A.CS143_GBN, A.CS143_JHD, A.CS143_FSD, A.CS143_PST, B.CS144_GND, X.DOCNO, X.APSTAT, X.CRIRUM
, A.CS143_FLG --추가(2020.02.17)
WITH UR
